body:
Hi EveryOne,



New to LadyBug I was using DIVA before and I though I'll give the Lady a try.

 

I was wondering if radiation component will work on a 2d surface. Right now I try it with 2d surface (imagine a ground plane) and an solid model of that ground. Right now only the solid model will display the proper radiation.

 

Is this right? that 2d surfaces won't work on ladybug radiation component

 

thank you all

 

cheers

replies.body:
Probably you need to check the normal direction of the surface and reverse if needed. This should work.

-A.
Yes!!! Thank you Abraham, you are right the normal was flippé
